issue.title: [Java] Add more maven style check for Java code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5587](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5587). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add more maven style check for java code, such as unused imports, redundant modifier, etc. In this way, the quality of code will be improved.
